snippet: Rohingya Muslims, denied citizenship in Myanmar, pass through Thailand on their way to relative safety in Malaysia or, if they cannot afford to pay unscrupulous brokers, languish there.
abstract: Rohingya Muslims, minority denied citizenship and persecuted in Myanmar, pass through Thailand on their way to relative safety in Malaysia or, if they cannot afford to pay unscrupulous brokers, languish there; Thailand has denied to grant them temporary shelter or basic services.

byline.contributor: Wai Moe contributed reporting from Yangon, Myanmar.

lead_paragraph: Rohingya Muslims, denied citizenship in Myanmar, pass through Thailand on their way to relative safety in Malaysia or, if they cannot afford to pay unscrupulous brokers, languish there.

headline.main: For Myanmar Muslim Minority, No Escape From Brutality
headline.print_headline: For Myanmar Muslim Minority, No Escape From Brutality
